website_summaries.verdict: Straightforward and simple to use. The heavy-duty base and sturdy stand will suit contemporary and traditional homes alike.
pros: Emits a warm light, which is great for mood lighting
The energy-efficient LED technology doesn't heat the lamp shade
cons: It does have a finite lifespan of approximately 40,000 hours

customer_reviews.title: The lamp easy assemle and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is simple to put them together,the lamp looks thin but it works perfect I have another lamp,it is too bright and dazzle but this one is bright and warm,it is comfortable. That is what I need,thanks
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Practical and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my living room where I want more light in addition to a typical ceiling light. It is a reasonable price considering it’s a LED light. I tried this and it’s giving enough brightness to my living room I don’t even need to turn on the ceiling light anymore. Also i compared it with my roommate’s IKEA lamp, it’s attactive and even more sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Haier

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I needed a standing lamp for my room and this turned out to be perfect. The light was bright enough but not too bright where it blinds you and makes your eye uncomfortable. The assembly was extremely easy, it was just screwing on the poles and one cap to screw on the light cover. I was surprised that the LED light was built in instead of me having to purchase a light bulb out of pocket. Im pretty satisfied with the quality and build of the lamp so far. We will see how long the LED bulb lasts though.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: A Little Pricey...
customer_reviews.text: But it's LED! A feature that cannot be overstated: Sealed lighting element that burns cool... no filament to "burn out;" not in the traditional sense, anyways. Can potentially work for decades. And the most important feature... CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP to operate... pennies, not dollars, per month.
customer_reviews.author: B Q

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly as advertised. Come in couple pieces and easy to put together. Good quality and nice lamp for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: It lights up my room and it's easy on the eyes. Worth every penny.For the price this works just great. Assembled within minutes working from the top of the light down. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTIVE DISPOSALE LAMP
customer_reviews.text: This deceptive sounding lamp is actually a permanent light bulb with a cheap pole and plastic shade attached to it. Therefore this POS is a disposable floor lamp as once the bulb burns out .....it's done, toasted, finished. So if it fits into your trash it will have to be disposed of due to the fact that you can never replace the bulb. Very very deceptive as new bulbs are offered for sale with the order. Do you really want to spend this much on a bulb?
customer_reviews.author: Chloe bell

customer_reviews.title: Not Bright
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but not as bright as advertised. We wanted this to replace two lights, however we are about to keep two lights for a living room that is about 400 feet. I would return it but shoving it all into the tiny box will take too long and probably get even more styrofoam over my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Really Likes Prime

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lamp
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lamp. I thought it was odd coming in such a small box, but then saw how it is put together. Very easy to assemble and nice heavy base to keep it upright. Light is perfect for the office area is was purchased for. I would buy again for myself
customer_reviews.author: Aimee N Bott

customer_reviews.title: Can not replace dull bulb
customer_reviews.text: Read the fine print. This isn’t just a lamp. It’s a lamp with a build in LED bulb which you can’t replace with a new or brighter bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Bulb
customer_reviews.text: Must read carefully, didnt realize the light bulb cant be replaced. I thought I can place another bulb in it. Not a fan of the soft white light . What happened when the bulb burns out ???? Its bright though and it will work
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: THIS LAMP IS HORRIBLE !!! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS LAMP, IT IS BASICALLY A ONE TIME USE LAMP ONCE THE BULB BURNS OUT THATS IT ! THE BULB CAN NOT BE REPLACED I REPEAT BULB CAN NOT BE REPLACED ! AND HAS A BUILT IN LED LIGHT THAT YOU CAN NOT REPLACE PLEASE READ ALL OTHER REVIEWS BEFORE THINKING ABOUT PURCHASING THIS LAMP THIS IS HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Hcho22

customer_reviews.title: Customer was awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wrong one was ordered and they helped out a lot to get me the correct color. Thxs
customer_reviews.author: gidget caspers

customer_reviews.title: Look the same as pictures
customer_reviews.text: Not bad ,not hard to assemble It's a good price for the lamp,sturdy made,works perfect Great lighting,it's my best choice
customer_reviews.author: dongyao

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap lamp
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice to purchase a lamp with a lightbulb you can replace. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to assemble. It's sturdy, proportional, beautiful, and serves my lighting purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: WOW these are great lamps!
customer_reviews.text: these lamps are easy to assemble and come with a light bulb. arrived quickly
customer_reviews.author: lindaSoCal

customer_reviews.title: lamp works
customer_reviews.text: The switch falls off. I discovered it was glued on with some of that clear jelly-like glue. I need to figure out how to attach it better.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, easy to assemble, gives good lighting to the room. Clean elegant style. Cheap and very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not elegant
customer_reviews.text: Works great but lamp cover is plastic. Good for a room that isn’t visible to others.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Cant replace the bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I love it but upset that if it dies you cant buy replacement bulbs
customer_reviews.author: Copper Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Decent floor lamp. Easy assembly and the light is bright.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected for the price. Just go to Target instead for a better quality lamp for the same price or cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bird

customer_reviews.title: Bright light as I want
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is pretty worth its price, bright enough in a kids room. First one comes with a little problem but Amazon resend a new one very quick.
customer_reviews.author: llh

customer_reviews.title: Poor Material
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was made from very poor materials and very unstable regardless of how tight you put it together. The shade is not secure enough either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Much flimsier than I was expecting. Easy assembly and very lightweight. Not that bright though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G. DiAmico

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Floor lamp
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. The floor lamp was well packed. It took me about 10 minutes to assemble the lamp. The light is warm.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: hate it
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to screw pieces together and get them all straight. I may just throw it out. You CANNOT change the bulb...ever. That's when you throw away money you wasted on it..
customer_reviews.author: Mariedina

customer_reviews.title: Good for dorms and offices
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for its price . I use it for my home office and I am happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Good priced lamp, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a lamp for his bedroom in his new apartment. He found this one on Amazon, so I bought it. He says it wad eady to put together, sturdy, and gave off ample light - depends on bulb wattage. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: glenda cash

customer_reviews.title: Can't assemble it
customer_reviews.text: This lamp comes with 6 sections that screw together to create the column of the lamp. Five worked just fine, but one connector was not milled correctly, and would not screw into the next section. That connector was visibly different from the others. If you were to get one that can be assembled, this creates a thin column lamp with a plastic shade that is 10" wide by 5" high. The light is warm, but not very bright. Better for bringing light in a specific spot than general lighting for an area.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Stout

customer_reviews.title: 60w integrated bulb not replaceable
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these torch style floor lamps. They're perfect for getting good ambient lighting. This one has a built-in 9w LED bulb (equivalent to 60w). It takes some effort to get the 5 segments screwed on correctly. My tip is to start from the base and screw on the headlamp portion last. Once set up, the LED light does sit straight. It's a bit dim with only 60w strength for my purposes. It would work well in a smaller room. The lamp shade is plastic so I'm not sure how long it will last. Plus the bulb can't be replaced. Supposedly it will last but warranty provided is only for 1 yr.
customer_reviews.author: OnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few reviews complaining about assembly, I was a bit worried. In the end, I spent more time picking up the broken bits of Styrofoam (the lamp arrived fine, but the foam was very messy) than assembling it. Start at the lamp and work down. Pull the cord through and install the shade. The light is OK. Not great, but not flickery. I'd expect better for $50 and amazing for $70+, but for $30-35, this isn't bad. I'll be ordering another. I gave this a 4 star review, but then I ordered another. Felt odd only giving 4 stars when I wanted another. EIther way, it's great if you know what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Shane O. Laake

customer_reviews.title: Bright and easy to assemble; but it’s plastic
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is totally fine. It assembled easily enough. It’s the standard floor lamp stem that screws together piece by piece (so it can all fit in a small box). The cord comes out of the base and has to bend at a 90 degree angle which I dislike but at least there’s a groove for the cord. Since the shade is plastic it’s not too heavy. And even if it gets knocked over, there’s not fear of injury. Still, it feels a bit cheap so if all you care about is function you’ll be happy but if you want one that looks nice, you’ll want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: evanjamesroskos

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, garbage product.
customer_reviews.text: I had this lamp, but was listed under another sunllipe product, who’s page no longer exists. Sunllipe customer service is good but the product is garbage. The original lamp that didn’t screw together right still worked but the led burned out in less than a year. The replacement screwed together ok but also burned out, 1 month after the year warranty expired. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cheap Light, One Small Drawback
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra light in my office for ambient fill light. This lamp is perfect for that. It assembles easy enough, really you just screw the lost sections together. The only drawback is the white half dome used to disperse the light, it is SO cheap and bendable. I left my lamp leaning into the wall which made that light diffuser squish in and bend. I straightened it out and it's mostly fine, BECAUSE it's cheap and bendable. But overall the light is soft and works well to fill in ambient light.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp but light bulbs don't seem to be replaceable
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic floor lamp. This style is widely available and I have seen it at many different stores. It produces a soft light but it is bright enough to light up an averaged-sized bedroom. It is a neutral black with a modern but simple upturned shade. The light bulbs are a number of tiny LEDs embedded in the top of the lamp. I don't think they are replaceable so when they burn out, I'm assuming the lamp will need to be thrown out. I would prefer to be able to change out the light bulbs. We'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: mhp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Basic
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing particularly amazing of the SUNLLIPE floor lamp. It has basic styling and has a plastic shade. It's not going to be the cool showcase lamp for your front room but it works great in kid bedrooms, in family rooms and in places where you just need a little more light. It is so simple to put together and it gives good lighting. I like that it is pretty tall and lights the room. It is pretty sturdy and just kind of blends into the background of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Utah Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than most
customer_reviews.text: This torchiere lamp is much nicer than most lamps of this type. The light is soft and I like the switch which is usually the first thing to break with these sorts of lamps. It was easy to assemble and seems solid. I'm not worried about it falling over. Illuminate a dark corner with this soft, warm light.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Assembling the lamp was very easy. Each piece just screws into the other. The lamp already had a bulb in it. It was ready to use immediately. I like the simple look and am using it in my guest bedroom. The light is easy on the eyes but not too bright. But, one lamp provides enough light to light up the rooms
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan Alexandros

customer_reviews.title: got two, one's dead already
customer_reviews.text: We bought two a year ago and they seemed fine--not adjustable, not beautiful, but fine--and then one quit this week and can't be fixed. It's an inexpensive lamp, but pricey for just a one-year disposable item. I guess the other will go soon.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: low cost, but does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Just love these low cost floor lamps put em anywhere, they light up a room they are so cheap, who cares if they break in 3 years or more... these are as good as the ones I used to buy at HDepot, but at a better price point...
customer_reviews.author: funbear

customer_reviews.title: Heavy base and soft light
customer_reviews.text: This SUNLLIPE lamp looks good with just about any decor. The simple lines and soft light are easy on the eyes and saves energy. I put mine in the corner of the room where it leaves a nice glow over the whole area. At night, this gives any room a cozy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Moment

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for class
customer_reviews.text: I have this as a classroom lamp, and coincidentally, it matches one I already had that was lent to me by another teacher. A HS student assembled it for me, and the bulb is included. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cafali

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - knobs are easy to turn - knobs don't pop off in your hand - good value for cost - doesn't give off too much heat - throws a lot of light - easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: LED light burned out in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this lamp till the LED light burned out after 6 months. Now the whole thing is going to trash and I have to buy a new lamp that uses a regular bulb that you can replace. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: VNM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lamp, easy to assemble and very bright. Also, LED so energy efficient.
customer_reviews.author: art 87

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good light. With the right LED bulb, it is bright. With the right position, it shines where I need it. And it is easy to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Warm white, too dim
customer_reviews.text: The LED is too dim and too warm in my opinion. But otherwise the build quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Krazy Kat

product_meta.title: SUNLLIPE Floor Lamp 70 inches Plastic Shade Modern Sturdy Standing Lamp Light 9W Energy Saving LED Torchiere Floor Lamp for Living Room, Dorm and Bedroom (Black)
feature_bullets: 【Integrated energy-saving led】sunllipe led floor lamps use bright smd 2835 led light, save up to 80% energy compared to traditional bulb and 9-watt led can provide 810 lumens and 3000 kelvin warm white to light up your living room, bedroom or office. So there is no need to take time to replace the bulb. Help you save your time and your money

【Overheated protection】 different from traditional incandescent lights, sunllipe floor lamp is with durable built-in led light. Also it is etl listed products provide you and your family with more confidence of safety, never worry about overheated and burn out

【Sturdy structure & modern design】sunllipe floor lamp has a sturdy structure as well as a good appearance to fit bedroom, living room and study. Heavy 10" Wide base, metal rod, rotary switch and white plastic shade with the cord(140" Long) coming out from the base. A beautiful indoor decoration
【Energy saving & versatile】sunllipe uplight lamp is made of modern sleek style and energy saving 9W led and its lightweight design makes it easily portable from room to room

【sunllipe guarantee】 risk-free purchase for sunllipe floor lamps with 1-year warranty against any defective products. So any questions, please feel free to contact our customer service email: support@sunllipe
